title: 83/377/EEC: Commission Decision of 25 July 1983 establishing that the apparatus described as 'SLM - Spectrofluorometer, model SLM 4800S' may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 25 July 1983
establishing that the apparatus described as 'SLM - Spectrofluorometer, model SLM 4800S' may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
(83/377/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as 'SLM - Spectrofluorometer, model SLM 4800S' which is subject of an application by the Federal Republic of Germany of 14 January 1983 may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 July 1983.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz NARJES
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 184, 15. 7. 1975, p. 1.
